title: Reconstruction shall be disallowed on set-back areas or areas required for road-widening and such areas shall be handed over to the Corporation
clause_text: Reconstruction shall be disallowed on set-back areas or areas required for road-widening and such areas shall be handed over to the Corporation. These provisions shall not apply to buildings wholly occupied by warehouses and godowns.
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order

source_pdf.text_snippet: Reconstruction shall be disallowed on set-back areas or areas required for road-widening and such areas shall be handed over to the Corporation.
